title: Starting League cuz of memes
body:
So 1 day i was opening my pc and i was gonna check out my facebook

It happened that my brother's facebook account was left open on my pc and there were league memes in the main page.

I was really interested and tried to understand at first but they all seemed funny and when i checked the comments people were just writing ''LOL'' or ''im dying'' comments.

I really really wanted to understand the memes and i quickly signed my own league account.

And to this day i still play league im glad i saw those memes that day.

I would like to know how you guys started league aswell.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body: Friendship... And devil contracts... Totally worth it

No... This is before I knew Teemo

Basically I signed a contract saying once I reached ranked I am to remain in bronze till season 7 then I can try and climb out

saw a friend playing at college at that time I believe it was still in season 1 he said it was a fun but at time frustrating game and I like games like that so I said cool ima try it a few weeks later cause I forgot when I got home that day to do it :/ I made an account and started this long and scary journey.
Friends started playing in season 1 so I started playing with them. Most of them quit, I stayed strong.

A lot of youtubers I watched were playing league at the time, so I picked it up.

a few videos.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GMPXUEgeO5Q
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gi4z_Vak5Qo

Let me see.... I had a laptop who couldn't handle real games. I wanted to play a new game, so I just scrolled through  a list of games I had heard off and found League of Legends to appear to be the most fun. 
I did some crazy shit in the beginning, but slowly learned the meta.

I needed to buy a new computer, and I know very little about computers, so a friend of mine said he'd help me find a good one as long as I played this game with him. He found me a good one, I started playing.

Saw my brother playing it wayy back when it was in alpha nnd decided i would check it out when it was released and "Done".

Although back then noone knew the concept of the "Game that is never finished". I remember when Vayne was released.

Still hate her.

I started league after hearing about Teemo.

My friends described him as a "Tiny person with a blowdart who hides out in bushes and kills people with poisons".

I expected a scrawny, bald, witch-doctor type character. 

Instead, I got an orange racoon with a scarf.

I feel gypped.

I played League all for fun, and before I haven't notice that {{champion:17}} is the Satan of LoL....
So I did bought him first on my first account (a long time ago)
Friends from WoW told me about it.
My cousin was watching LCS in July of season 3.
